messages.content: SaltAI is a platform that provides various custom nodes for use with ComfyUI, helping users achieve new dynamics in their workflows.
Are all SaltAI custom nodes dependent on the Salt repository?
No, some custom nodes provided by SaltAI can be installed without the Salt repository.
What is an example of a self-contained custom node in SaltAI?
SaltAI-OPAC-ComfyUI is an example of a self-contained custom node provided by SaltAI.
How does SaltAI help its users?
SaltAI helps its users by providing custom nodes that enable them to achieve new dynamics in their workflows when using ComfyUI.
Are SaltAI custom nodes limited to a specific platform?
The documentation does not specify any limitations regarding the platform for using SaltAI custom nodes.
Is SaltAI a standalone application or a plugin?
SaltAI is not a standalone application but a platform that provides custom nodes for use with ComfyUI.
Do SaltAI custom nodes require any additional software?
The documentation does not mention any specific additional software requirements for using SaltAI custom nodes.
